scoringmanagement

Class Scorer

  • java.lang.Object
    • scoringmanagement.Scorer

  • public class Scorer
extends java.lang.Object
    Main scoring class for student lab submissions. Receives the student's lab files from the "LabSubmission" class and compares them scoring various sections of the program based on the spec for said lab.
    Version:
    5/29
    Author:
    Max, Darshan

      • scoreLab

        public static Score scoreLab(java.lang.String labName,

      • score

        public static Score score(java.lang.String labSpec,
                          java.lang.String[] labFiles,
                          java.lang.String[] labNames)
        Acts as the main method and is the only outward facing method of class. scoreStudent calls all other methods within the class. Compilation of the student's labs is done by the Java provided library --> https://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/javax/tools/JavaCompiler.html Compilation section is forked from ---> https://github.com/0416354917/Algorithms/blob/master/src/util/InlineCompiler.java Bash setup and command line is forked from ---> https://stackoverflow.com/questions/26830617/java-running-bash-commands Bash execution is run by --> https://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/lang/ProcessBuilder.html
        Parameters:
        String - labSpec
        Sends - array of labFiles
        Returns:
        scoreData array holds the score output of the student's lab and returns the output to their student client

      • calcScore

        public static double calcScore(java.lang.String specName,
                               boolean testExec,
                               boolean testComp)
        Allows a user to score their lab based on compilation, execution, and their program output
        Parameters:
        String - specName
        boolean - testExec
        boolean - testComp
        Returns:
        double avgScore

      • scanDirectory

        public static java.io.File[] scanDirectory()
        Scans the user directory and returns all the .java files within it. These files are then accessed and used to for Scorer https://stackoverflow.com/questions/2102952/listing-files-in-a-directory-matching-a-pattern-in-java
        Returns:
        File[] files

      • getAllOut

        public java.lang.String[] getAllOut(java.lang.String specName)
        Finds the specific lab spec and scans it for all output to be cross referenced in Score
        Parameters:
        String - specName
        Returns:
        output

      • numComments

        public static int numComments()
        Counts the number of comments in all labFiles the student has submit. NOT APPLIED TO THEIR SCORE! This data is returned to the student only as a statistic.
        Returns:
        int commentNum

      • ackCounter

        public static int ackCounter()
        Counts the number of break statements in all labFiles the student has submit. NOT APPLIED TO THEIR SCORE! This data is returned to the student only as a statistic
        Returns:
        int breakNum

      • numJavaDoc

        public static int numJavaDoc()

        Returns:

      • numReturn

        public static int numReturn()

        Returns:
